title: All my Calendar data has disappeared
content: When I logged in today after a few days away I realised I was not getting any Task Reminders, although there should have been several for repeating tasks which were due whilst I was away. On looking in the Calendar window I found that all the Tasks had disappeared. How do I get them back? (I do have the computer backed up with Macrium Reflect, so I could restore the file(s) from last week, but I have no idea where the Calendar data is stored.)
creator: pfvincent

title: There was a popup box showing messages being fetched from server when Get Messages was chosen.
content: Older versions of Thunderbird 'Get Messages' provided a popup window in the lower corner showing messages being downloaded. It's gone. How can I get that option?
creator: pristinemagic

title: Trasportare tutti i dati di Thunderbird su un altro computer
content: Ho guardato le vostre istruzioni per il trasferimento di tutti gli elementi di Thunderbird ma proprio non riesco a seguire le istruzioni per il trasferimento di tutte le e-mail e degli account su un altro computer Posso avere una chatt o parlare con un operatore? Grazie mille

title: how do I connect to my apple email account
content: I know I have the right password but it's not accepted.
creator: jeremy8

title: Thunderbird and Optus Emails
content: I recently stopped receiving my Optusnet emails via Thunderbird, although I can still receive them via Optus webmail. As previous users have found out, changes were made to Optus's platform which didn't support Thunderbird, all without notifying customers. However, after lengthy discussions with Optus, they have assured me that they now support Thunderbird and after checking all the settings I should be able to receive emails via Thunderbird. However this is not the case and I am still relying on webmail. Does anyone have any ideas? Thanks in advance. aandr1
creator: aandr1

title: Different view of emails coming in only in links and text
content: Want to why this is the second time after an update that my emails have gone to only showing web links and not the actual email content i.e. images and text. Plus how do I change it back as not very tech savvy and don't want to have to save yet another file of these old emails to set up again to get them as readable visual emails not links. Have to go to a link to see the emails correctly this is not good when they could contain not wanted information.
creator: chezbaa7
